ygData.subject: Re: Pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well Met Tetasha ... http://www.onelist.com/subscribe/EQ_Potters Good question - I found to be a better Baker, one learns how to throw clay. ... I m half
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Drizzt_DoUrden@... (Chris Cornell)

Well Met Tetasha

> I was wondering if anyone out there has tried pottery yet?

http://www.onelist.com/subscribe/EQ_Potters

Good question -
I found to be a better Baker, one learns how to throw clay.

> I'm a level 11 cleric

I'm half the way there. <g>

with 50 trains saved up and had heard that eventually

> So if you have any info on pottery please share

As with any Onelist, and most of any of those about Everquest
have there archives worth reading through.

> if you've seen any guides on a webpage

There really is only one guide worth the trouble!
http://www.gameguides.com

Look for the unOfficial Everquest guide.
It explains all known skills and much, much more.

Cleric Taven (Veeshan)
Brotherhood of Balance
